shell.value: mkdir -p /build
go telemetry off && [ "$(go telemetry)" = "off" ] || { echo "Failed to disable Go telemetry"; exit 1; }
echo 'Binary::apt::APT::Keep-Downloaded-Packages "true";' > /etc/apt/apt.conf.d/keep-cache
apt-get update && apt-get install --no-install-recommends -y file

echo 'deb https://download.opensuse.org/repositories/devel:/tools:/criu/Debian_12/ /' > /etc/apt/sources.list.d/criu.list \
        && apt-get update \
        && apt-get install -y --no-install-recommends criu \
        && install -D /usr/sbin/criu /build/criu \
        && /build/criu --version
mkdir /build && mv /bin/registry /build/registry

here_docs.value:
set -e
  GOBIN=/build CGO_ENABLED=0 xx-go install "github.com/go-swagger/go-swagger/cmd/swagger@${GO_SWAGGER_VERSION}"
  xx-verify /build/swagger

shell.value:
apt-get update && apt-get install -y --no-install-recommends \
           ca-certificates \
           curl \
           jq

/download-frozen-image-v2.sh /build \
        busybox:latest@sha256:95cf004f559831017cdf4628aaf1bb30133677be8702a8c5f2994629f637a209 \
        busybox:glibc@sha256:1f81263701cddf6402afe9f33fca0266d9fff379e59b1748f33d3072da71ee85 \
        debian:trixie-slim@sha256:c85a2732e97694ea77237c61304b3bb410e0e961dd6ee945997a06c788c545bb \
        hello-world:latest@sha256:d58e752213a51785838f9eed2b7a498ffa1cb3aa7f946dda11af39286c3db9a9 \
        arm32v7/hello-world:latest@sha256:50b8560ad574c779908da71f7ce370c0a2471c098d44d1c8f6b513c5a55eeeb1 \
        hello-world:amd64@sha256:90659bf80b44ce6be8234e6ff90a1ac34acbeb826903b02cfa0da11c82cbc042 \
        hello-world:arm64@sha256:963612c5503f3f1674f315c67089dee577d8cc6afc18565e0b4183ae355fb343
git init . && git remote add origin "https://github.com/go-delve/delve.git"
git fetch -q --depth 1 origin "${DELVE_VERSION}" +refs/tags/*:refs/tags/* && git checkout -q FETCH_HEAD

GOBIN=/build CGO_ENABLED=0 go install "github.com/tc-hib/go-winres@${GOWINRES_VERSION}" \
     && /build/go-winres --help
git init . && git remote add origin "https://github.com/containerd/containerd.git"
git fetch -q --depth 1 origin "${CONTAINERD_VERSION}" +refs/tags/*:refs/tags/* && git checkout -q FETCH_HEAD

apt-get update && xx-apt-get install -y --no-install-recommends \
            gcc \
            pkg-config

here_docs.value:
set -e
  export CC=$(xx-info)-gcc
  export CGO_ENABLED=$([ "$DOCKER_STATIC" = "1" ] && echo "0" || echo "1")
  xx-go --wrap
  make $([ "$DOCKER_STATIC" = "1" ] && echo "STATIC=1") binaries
  xx-verify $([ "$DOCKER_STATIC" = "1" ] && echo "--static") bin/containerd
  xx-verify $([ "$DOCKER_STATIC" = "1" ] && echo "--static") bin/containerd-shim-runc-v2
  xx-verify $([ "$DOCKER_STATIC" = "1" ] && echo "--static") bin/ctr
  mkdir /build
  mv bin/containerd bin/containerd-shim-runc-v2 bin/ctr /build

shell.value:
GOBIN=/build CGO_ENABLED=0 go install "github.com/golangci/golangci-lint/v2/cmd/golangci-lint@${GOLANGCI_LINT_VERSION}" \
     && /build/golangci-lint --version

GOBIN=/build CGO_ENABLED=0 go install "gotest.tools/gotestsum@${GOTESTSUM_VERSION}" \
     && /build/gotestsum --version

GOBIN=/build CGO_ENABLED=0 go install "mvdan.cc/sh/v3/cmd/shfmt@${SHFMT_VERSION}" \
     && /build/shfmt --version

GOBIN=/build CGO_ENABLED=0 go install "golang.org/x/tools/gopls@latest" \
     && /build/gopls version

rm -f ./.git/*.lock \
     && /download-or-build-cli.sh ${DOCKERCLI_VERSION} ${DOCKERCLI_REPOSITORY} /build \
     && /build/docker --version \
     && /build/docker completion bash >/completion.bash

rm -f ./.git/*.lock \
     && /download-or-build-cli.sh ${DOCKERCLI_INTEGRATION_VERSION} ${DOCKERCLI_INTEGRATION_REPOSITORY} /build \
     && /build/docker --version
git init . && git remote add origin "https://github.com/opencontainers/runc.git"
git fetch -q --depth 1 origin "${RUNC_VERSION}" +refs/tags/*:refs/tags/* && git checkout -q FETCH_HEAD

apt-get update && xx-apt-get install -y --no-install-recommends \
            gcc \
            libc6-dev \
            libseccomp-dev \
            pkg-config

here_docs.value:
set -e
  xx-go --wrap
  CGO_ENABLED=1 make "$([ "$DOCKER_STATIC" = "1" ] && echo "static" || echo "runc")"
  xx-verify $([ "$DOCKER_STATIC" = "1" ] && echo "--static") runc
  mkdir /build
  mv runc /build/

apt-get update && apt-get install -y --no-install-recommends cmake

here_docs.value:
set -e
  CC=$(xx-info)-gcc cmake .
  make tini-static
  xx-verify --static tini-static
  mkdir /build
  mv tini-static /build/docker-init

here_docs.value:
set -e
  export CGO_ENABLED=$([ "$DOCKER_STATIC" = "1" ] && echo "0" || echo "1")
  xx-go build -o /build/rootlesskit -ldflags="$([ "$DOCKER_STATIC" != "1" ] && echo "-linkmode=external")" ./cmd/rootlesskit
  xx-verify $([ "$DOCKER_STATIC" = "1" ] && echo "--static") /build/rootlesskit

shell.value:
apt-get update && apt-get install -y --no-install-recommends \
            autoconf \
            automake \
            build-essential \
            libcap-dev \
            libprotobuf-c-dev \
            libseccomp-dev \
            libsystemd-dev \
            libtool \
            libyajl-dev \
            python3 \
            ;

git clone https://github.com/containers/crun.git /tmp/crun-build && \
    cd /tmp/crun-build && \
    git checkout -q "${CRUN_VERSION}" && \
    ./autogen.sh && \
    ./configure --bindir=/build && \
    make -j install
git init . && git remote add origin "https://github.com/docker-archive/windows-container-utility.git"
git fetch -q --depth 1 origin "${CONTAINERUTILITY_VERSION}" +refs/tags/*:refs/tags/* && git checkout -q FETCH_HEAD

xx-apt-get install -y --no-install-recommends \
        gcc \
        g++ \
        libc6-dev \
        pkg-config

here_docs.value:
set -e
  CC="$(xx-info)-gcc" CXX="$(xx-info)-g++" make
  xx-verify --static containerutility.exe
  mkdir /build
  mv containerutility.exe /build/

shell.value:
apt-get update && apt-get install -y --no-install-recommends \
            dbus \
            dbus-user-session \
            systemd \
            systemd-sysv

apt-get update && apt-get install -y --no-install-recommends \
            firewalld
groupadd -r docker

useradd --create-home --gid docker unprivilegeduser \
 && mkdir -p /home/unprivilegeduser/.local/share/docker \
 && chown -R unprivilegeduser /home/unprivilegeduser
ln -sfv /go/src/github.com/docker/docker/.bashrc ~/.bashrc
echo "source /usr/share/bash-completion/bash_completion" >> /etc/bash.bashrc
ldconfig
git config --global --add safe.directory $GOPATH/src/github.com/docker/docker

apt-get update && apt-get install -y --no-install-recommends \
            apparmor \
            bash-completion \
            bzip2 \
            fuse-overlayfs \
            inetutils-ping \

here_docs.value:
# in bullseye arm64 target does not link with lld so configure it to use ld instead
  if [ "$(xx-info arch)" = "arm64" ]; then
    XX_CC_PREFER_LINKER=ld xx-clang --setup-target-triple
  fi

set -e
  target=$([ "$DOCKER_STATIC" = "1" ] && echo "binary" || echo "dynbinary")
  xx-go --wrap
  PKG_CONFIG=$(xx-go env PKG_CONFIG) ./hack/make.sh $target
  xx-verify $([ "$DOCKER_STATIC" = "1" ] && echo "--static") /tmp/bundles/${target}-daemon/dockerd$([ "$(xx-info os)" = "windows" ] && echo ".exe")
  [ "$(xx-info os)" != "linux" ] || xx-verify $([ "$DOCKER_STATIC" = "1" ] && echo "--static") /tmp/bundles/${target}-daemon/docker-proxy
  mkdir /build
  mv /tmp/bundles/${target}-daemon/* /build/

set -ex
  file dockerd
  dockerd --version
  file docker-proxy
  docker-proxy --version
